overview: Anan (played by Liu Qingyun) was originally a Vietnamese soldier, yet because he hated the cruelty of war, he fled to Hong Kong and was placed in a refugee camp. Anan reunites with his long-lost brother Anzi (played by Wang Shuqi) in the camp. The two hope to immigrate to France and have a new life. In the refugee camp, the two gangs headed by Big Brother Ji and Big Brother Quan (played by Hsu Chung-sin) often fight openly and secretly for power.
title: Story of Nam
